entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:35 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
